thread.title: Hertz Asia bags another Best-In-Class Award
thread.title_full: Hertz Asia bags another Best-In-Class Award

author: Chisa Boonmee
title: Hertz Asia bags another Best-In-Class Award
text:
Email 
LO Li-Wen, Senior Director Marketing Asia Pacific, travelled to Bangkok to receive the Travel Hall of Fame Award at the 26th Annual TTG Travel Awards 2015, the most prestigious travel industry recognition in Asia. 
The Travel Hall of Fame is bestowed upon the region’s most exceptional organisations, who have attained the industry’s acknowledgement for being the leader in its field. Other best-in-class premium brands who are members of the Travel Hall of Fame include Singapore Airlines, Raffles Hotel, Banyan Tree. 
“Hertz is the first and only car rental brand in the TTG Asia Awards’ Travel Hall of Fame . This is testament to our market leadership and brand recognition in Asia. We will continue to religiously support our travel trade stakeholders who bestow us this honor,” Li-Wen, Senior Director Marketing Asia Pacific said at the Awards night. “We are extremely thrilled about the growth prospects unleashed from the recent consolidation of our Asia Pacific business as well as the tremendous opportunities presented by our multiple brands – Hertz, Dollar, Firefly, FlexiCar and Ace.”
